function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Importation of dengue from dengue-affected areas through air travel","Impact":"Increase in the incidence of imported dengue cases","Mitigation":"Implement screening measures for travelers from dengue-affected areas","Technologies":"Health screening technologies, travel history tracking","People":"Air travelers from dengue-affected areas","Owner":"Health authorities, airport authorities, airlines"},{"Description":"Relationship between air travel volume and imported dengue cases","Impact":"Significant increase in imported dengue cases with increased air travel volume","Mitigation":"Regulate air travel volume from dengue-affected areas, implement traveler education programs","Technologies":"Travel data analysis, education and awareness campaigns","People":"Air travelers, airline companies, regulatory authorities","Owner":"Regulatory authorities, airline companies, public health agencies"},{"Description":"Seasonal variation in the rate of imported dengue cases","Impact":"Higher incidence of imported dengue cases during certain months","Mitigation":"Implement targeted interventions during high-risk months, increase surveillance and monitoring","Technologies":"Epidemiological data analysis, predictive modeling, surveillance systems","People":"Population in regions at risk of imported dengue","Owner":"Public health agencies, local government, community organizations"}]}
